NounVerbTask.TEXT: The criteria for severe acute pancreatitis were defined as organ failure of at least one organ system (systolic blood pressure <90 mm Hg, PaO2 <60 mm Hg, creatinine >2.0 mg/dL after rehydration, and gastrointestinal bleeding >500 mL/24 h) and the presence of local complications such as necrosis, pseudocyst, and abscess.
